blinky.h¶

class Blinky¶

Public Functions

Blinky(LedDriverInterface &arg_ledDriver)¶

Blinky constructor.

Parameters

  • [in] arg_ledDriver: A LedDriver implementing the LedDriverInterface

void start(void)¶

Start the blinking.

bool isStarted(void)¶

Return the blinking state as a boolean.

Return

bool: true if blinking is started, false if the blinking is not started

void stop(void)¶

Stop the blinking.

void refresh(void)¶

Schedule the blinking.

LedDriverInterface.h¶

class LedDriverInterface¶

Public Functions

virtual void on(void) = 0¶

Switch the LED on.

virtual bool isOn(void) = 0¶

Check if the LED is on.

Return

bool: true is LED is on, false if LED is off

virtual void off(void) = 0¶

Switch the LED off.

virtual bool isOff(void) = 0¶

Check if the LED is on.

Return

bool: true is LED is off, false if LED is on

virtual void toggle(void) = 0¶

Toggle the LED.
